attributes.action: use Building Regs and incentives to discourage gas central heating which does not first generate electricity 100% efficiently by then using the waste heat for dometic heating
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cooling towers in our thermal power stations send 60% of the combustion energy straight into the air as waste heat, only 40% becomes electricity. Widespread use of micro-Combined-Heat&Power could prevent this waste and reduce this CO2 by 60%.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
